Name: Octoshield VR
About the game: Ever wanted to throw a shield at your enemies with all your might? Now you can. Octoshield VR is an action packed arena game for the HTC Vive in which your only weapon is a deadly shield. Throw it at your enemies to annihilate them, but don't forget to protect yourself with it, or you will get hit by lasers! Note before buying: Development on this game has stopped until further notice. If you buy the game, please don't expect new updates to come. There is a thread about it in the community page if you want to know more.
Meta Title: Octoshield VR: Jun 14, 2016, Liana Pigeot and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Octoshield VR? Check out the release date (Jun 14, 2016), developer insights from Liana Pigeot, and a complete game summary.
